Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I've been hammering away with a ridiculously enormous mod list for some time now.

I have been working on a Munar Base and have built a selection of vehicles to deal with most of the common issues of setting up on the Mun

I present for your approval: The Bug Vehicles!

I would like to see more of this series. I would also deeply appreciate it if you constructed a demonstration base to show off what the BUG series is capable of. Can it be used anywhere? Or is it limited to places with Kerbin-like gravity?
could you post a mod list please?

Apologies for being slow to reply;I think we must be in different time zones.

The mods I use for the bugs are:

KSP Interstellar:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43839-0-25-KSP-Interstellar-(Magnetic-Nozzles-ISRU-Revamp)-Version-0-13

RetroFuture (These are for the cabs and chassis):

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84054-v-25-RetroFuture-v1-6-3-Utilities-and-utilities

Extraplanetary Launchpads:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59545-Extraplanetary-Launchpads-v3-4

TweakScale:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80234-0-25-TweakScale-Rescale-Everything!-(v1-44-2014-10-10-19-20-UTC)

Internal Robotics:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/37707-0-25-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Infernal-Robotics-0-19-2

Kerbal Attatchment System:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92514-0-24-2-Kerbal-Attachment-System-%28KAS%29-0-4-8-Fixed-for-0-24-2-x86-x64-%29

Kerbal Foundries (For the awesome tank tracks):

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102-WIP-PARTS-PLUGIN-0-24-2-Kerbal-Foundries-wheels-anti-grav-repulsors-and-tracks

Craft files for the bugs can be found here:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/53041599/SPH.zip

As for more examples of what they can do / where they can operate, I've made some other videos as well, I'll link them:

Video 1 (The first bug demonstration):

Video 2 (Encapsulation inside a fairing and stuff like that):

Video 3 (Landings + Example of useage of the Junk Bug on the Mun):

I also threw together some of the footage I've been working on for a Bug-themed munbase into a sped up 'music video'

Plans have changed and I'm now going to be doing the munbase videos in collaboration with a friend of mine. If there's any particular part of the video you want to see at normal speed, give me a shout and I'll upload it at normal speed!
Behold, my magnum opus. 50 tons of rovers landed on a planet!
